plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-auth
plugins.description: Contains key-types for authentication, such as oauth-authentication

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-cassandra
plugins.description: Introduces Cql Requests to Milkman using cassandra datastax driver.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-cli
plugins.description: This is an experimental interactive command line interface for plugin. After copying the content of the archive to the root directory of milkman, you can start it by `mm` on terminal.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-explore
plugins.description: Extends Milkman-rest with an additional response-tab that allows for `application/json` responses to be explored using JMesPath.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-grpc
plugins.description: Grpc Plugin for communication with Grpc Servers.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-jdbc
plugins.description: Introduces Sql Requests to Milkman using JDBC.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-nosql
plugins.description: Introduces Nosql Requests to Milkman using JNoSql.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-note
plugins.description: This is a very simple plugin that adds a tab to each request where users can enter some notes about the request.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-privatebin
plugins.description: Allows to share requests etc via Privatebin.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-rest
plugins.description: Introduces Http request (despite the wrong naming) capabilities to milkman. Consists of serveral features that together should make milkman be usable as postman-replacement for day-to-day work.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-scripting
plugins.description: provides scripting capabilities via `nashorn` javascript engine

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-sync-git
plugins.description: This plugin allows to setup a git repository to where a workspace can be synchronized.

plugins.author: warmuuh
plugins.name: milkman-test
plugins.description: a testrunner plugin that allows to execute multiple requests in a sequence and verify their results.
